definitions.text: engaging in the business of keeping money for savings and checking accounts or for exchange or for issuing loans and credit etc.
transacting business with a bank; depositing or withdrawing funds or requesting a loan etc.

examples: the pilot had to bank the aircraft

definitions.text: do business with a bank or keep an account at a bank
examples: Where do you bank in this town?

definitions.text: act as the banker in a game or in gambling

examples: She deposits her paycheck every month

definitions.text: cover with ashes so to control the rate of burning

examples: I swear by my grandmother's recipes
